synopsis.text:
Amagi Hikaru, an unassuming 16-year-old girl, has been leading a life filled with typical teenage pursuits, such as nurturing secret hobbies, harboring crushes, and enjoying her favorite superhero shows. Little does she know that her mundane existence is about to take a dramatic turn, as she discovers her true identity as an alien princess from the distant planet of Gran.

Hailing from a lineage of extraordinary intergalactic scientists, Hikaru learns that she is the last surviving member of her royal family and the guardian of the powerful Royal Armor, which has the potential to determine the destiny of the entire cosmos. Her ordinary life shatters when a menacing robot, hell-bent on seizing the Royal Armor, threatens her world and everyone she holds dear.

With the battle cry "GRAN Change," Hikaru embraces her newfound heritage and transforms into Hyper Speed GranDoll, wielding the mighty Grandoll Armour. As humanity's last beacon of hope against the impending alien invasion, she must now protect her loved ones, her home planet, and the very fabric of the universe. Prepare for an exhilarating adventure as Hikaru balances the challenges of adolescence with the responsibilities of her cosmic legacy!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
